casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Tyriece S. FULLER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 18, 2018

Lisa J. Sleele, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Melissa L. Streeto, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 575, 177 A.3d 578 (2017), is denied.
